blocks.name: cncph
blocks.content: The set of complex numbers is an inner product (pre-Hilbert) space. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 28-Apr-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cncph(class c0) {
  |- wcel(c0, ccphlo)
  -| wceq(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
} = {
  eqeltri(c0, ccphlo, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
  mpbir2an(wcel(cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), ccphlo), wcel(cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), cnv), wral(hs0, cc, wral(hs1, cc, wceq(co(co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))))))
  cnnv(cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
  eqid(cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, cc, wceq(co(co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))))
  eqtrd(co(co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))), co(co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)))
  oveq2d(co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)))
  oveq1d(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2, cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)))
  fveq2d(cabs, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)))
  eqtrd(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, cneg(cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)))
  oveq2d(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1)), cneg(cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)))
  adantl(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1)), cneg(cv(hs1))))
  mulm1(cv(hs1))
  negsub(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  eqtrd(co(co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))), co(co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)), caddc, co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)))
  eqtrd(co(co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), co(co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)), caddc, co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))), co(co(co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(hs1)))))), caddc, co(co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(hs1))))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)))
  oveq12d(co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), co(co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(hs1)))))), co(co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(hs1)))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)))
  sqabsadd(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  sqabssub(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  ppncand(co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(hs1))))), co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(hs1))))), cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wcel(cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(hs1)))), cc))
  2cn()
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(hs1)))), cc), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(hs1))), cc))
  sylan2(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(hs1))), cc), wcel(cfv(ccj, cv(hs1)), cc))
  cjcl(cv(hs1))
  mulcl(cv(hs0), cfv(ccj, cv(hs1)))
  recnd(cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(hs1)))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(hs1))), cc))
  recl(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(hs1))))
  mulcl(nat2, cfv(cre, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cfv(ccj, cv(hs1)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wceq(co(co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)), caddc, co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))), wcel(co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)), cc))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)), cc), wcel(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), cc), wcel(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2), cc))
  sqcld(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  recnd(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  abscl(cv(hs0))
  sqcld(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cc))
  recnd(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cc))
  abscl(cv(hs1))
  addcl(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))
  eqcomd(co(co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)), caddc, co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))), wcel(co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)), cc))
  2times(co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))
  mp3an(wb(wcel(cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), ccphlo), wa(wcel(cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), cnv), wral(hs0, cc, wral(hs1, cc, wceq(co(co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cv(hs1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(cabs, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))))))), wcel(caddc, universe), wcel(cmul, universe), wcel(cabs, universe))
  addex()
  mulex()
  mp2an(wcel(cabs, universe), wf(cabs, cc, cr), wcel(cc, universe))
  absf()
  cnex()
  fex(cabs, cc, cr, universe)
  isphg(hs0, hs1, caddc, universe, cmul, universe, cabs, universe, cc)
  grporn(cc, caddc)
  ax-mp(wcel(caddc, cgr), wcel(caddc, cablo))
  cnaddabloOLD()
  ablogrpo(caddc)
  fdmi(caddc, cxp(cc, cc), cc)
  ax-addf()
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs0.c(cmul)
  diff.hs0.c(cabs)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(cmul)
  diff.hs1.c(cabs)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cncph(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 ‚àà CPreHilOLD
  ‚ä£ c0 = < < +, √ó >, abs >
} = {
  eqeltri(c0, ccphlo, < < +, √ó >, abs >)
  mpbir2an(< < +, √ó >, abs > ‚àà CPreHilOLD, < < +, √ó >, abs > ‚àà NrmCVec, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,(((abs `(hs0[+]hs1))[^]2)[+]((abs `(hs0[+](-u(1)[√ó]hs1)))[^]2))=(2[√ó](((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))))))
  cnnv(< < +, √ó >, abs >)
  eqid(< < +, √ó >, abs >)
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, cc, (((abs `(hs0[+]hs1))[^]2)[+]((abs `(hs0[+](-u(1)[√ó]hs1)))[^]2))=(2[√ó](((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))))
  eqtrd((((abs `(hs0[+]hs1))[^]2)[+]((abs `(hs0[+](-u(1)[√ó]hs1)))[^]2)), (2[√ó](((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))), (((abs `(hs0[+]hs1))[^]2)[+]((abs `(hs0[-]hs1))[^]2)), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  oveq2d(((abs `(hs0[+]hs1))[^]2), caddc, ((abs `(hs0[+](-u(1)[√ó]hs1)))[^]2), ((abs `(hs0[-]hs1))[^]2), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  oveq1d((abs `(hs0[+](-u(1)[√ó]hs1))), cexp, nat2, (abs `(hs0[-]hs1)), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  fveq2d(cabs, (hs0[+](-u(1)[√ó]hs1)), (hs0[-]hs1), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  eqtrd((hs0[+](-u(1)[√ó]hs1)), (hs0[-]hs1), (hs0[+]-u(hs1)), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  oveq2d(hs0, caddc, (-u(1)[√ó]hs1), -u(hs1), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  adantl(hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (-u(1)[√ó]hs1)= -u(hs1))
  mulm1(hs1)
  negsub(hs0, hs1)
  eqtrd((((abs `(hs0[+]hs1))[^]2)[+]((abs `(hs0[-]hs1))[^]2)), (2[√ó](((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))), ((((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))[+](((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  eqtrd((((abs `(hs0[+]hs1))[^]2)[+]((abs `(hs0[-]hs1))[^]2)), ((((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))[+](((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))), (((((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))[+](2[√ó](Re `(hs0[√ó](* ` hs1)))))[+]((((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))[-](2[√ó](Re `(hs0[√ó](* ` hs1)))))), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  oveq12d(((abs `(hs0[+]hs1))[^]2), caddc, ((abs `(hs0[-]hs1))[^]2), ((((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))[+](2[√ó](Re `(hs0[√ó](* ` hs1))))), ((((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))[-](2[√ó](Re `(hs0[√ó](* ` hs1))))), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  sqabsadd(hs0, hs1)
  sqabssub(hs0, hs1)
  ppncand((((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2)), (2[√ó](Re `(hs0[√ó](* ` hs1)))), (((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2)), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  sylancr((hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ), (2[√ó](Re `(hs0[√ó](* ` hs1))))‚àà ‚ÑÇ, 2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (Re `(hs0[√ó](* ` hs1)))‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  2cn()
  syl((hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ), (Re `(hs0[√ó](* ` hs1)))‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (hs0[√ó](* ` hs1))‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  sylan2(hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (hs0[√ó](* ` hs1))‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (* ` hs1)‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  cjcl(hs1)
  mulcl(hs0, (* ` hs1))
  recnd((Re `(hs0[√ó](* ` hs1))), (hs0[√ó](* ` hs1))‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  recl((hs0[√ó](* ` hs1)))
  mulcl(nat2, (Re `(hs0[√ó](* ` hs1))))
  syl((hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ), ((((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))[+](((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2)))=(2[√ó](((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))), (((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  syl2an(hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))‚àà ‚ÑÇ, ((abs ` hs0)[^]2)‚àà ‚ÑÇ, ((abs ` hs1)[^]2)‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  sqcld((abs ` hs0), hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  recnd((abs ` hs0), hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  abscl(hs0)
  sqcld((abs ` hs1), hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  recnd((abs ` hs1), hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  abscl(hs1)
  addcl(((abs ` hs0)[^]2), ((abs ` hs1)[^]2))
  eqcomd(((((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))[+](((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))), (2[√ó](((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))), (((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  2times((((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2)))
  mp3an((< < +, √ó >, abs > ‚àà CPreHilOLD ‚Üî(< < +, √ó >, abs > ‚àà NrmCVec ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,(((abs `(hs0[+]hs1))[^]2)[+]((abs `(hs0[+](-u(1)[√ó]hs1)))[^]2))=(2[√ó](((abs ` hs0)[^]2)[+]((abs ` hs1)[^]2))))))), + ‚àà ùïå, √ó ‚àà ùïå, abs ‚àà ùïå)
  addex()
  mulex()
  mp2an(abs ‚àà ùïå, (abs : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚Ñù), ‚ÑÇ ‚àà ùïå)
  absf()
  cnex()
  fex(cabs, cc, cr, universe)
  isphg(hs0, hs1, caddc, universe, cmul, universe, cabs, universe, cc)
  grporn(cc, caddc)
  ax-mp(+ ‚àà GrpOp, + ‚àà AbelOp)
  cnaddabloOLD()
  ablogrpo(caddc)
  fdmi(caddc, (‚ÑÇ √ó ‚ÑÇ), cc)
  ax-addf()
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs0.c(cmul)
  diff.hs0.c(cabs)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(cmul)
  diff.hs1.c(cabs)
}

blocks.name: elimph
blocks.content: Hypothesis elimination lemma for complex inner product spaces to assist weak deduction theorem. (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: elimphu
blocks.content: Hypothesis elimination lemma for complex inner product spaces to assist weak deduction theorem. (Contributed by NM, 6-May-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
